comment._content:
This is the man who brought me into the LSE.

Thank you Peter!

Michael Potter

comment.author: 48534950@N03
comment._content: Peter Wiles was my advisor and friend. He was truly a great person and a scholar with a sharp mind and clever wit.

comment.author: 55104268@N06
comment._content: This is the man who thought me tolerance, and that "love is better than hate".  He and his wife will always be in my heart.  He was a great part of my life at LSE.  Siamak Moghaddam, 1981
